Hello,
Some quick background: I have been successful in having Transport communicate via localhost using both the provided tutorials and modified variations with zero issues. All libraries where installed via apt (dpkg output attached). 

Current issue: Taking the same code (attached) and putting it on two locally networked machines results in the subscriber connecting to the callback but not handling the message. The callback is never called and the program sits patiently with no errors/warnings. I have included the IGN_VERBOSE output from the subscriber.
